description: This sweater is a practical knitted sweater in extra soft and pure merino wool. It has a zip in the neck, which means that it can be both nice and warm when it is closed, but can also be zipped down so you can get some air. The sweater is knitted on manual machines, which are CO2 neutral. The coloring is Oekotex certified.
name: Dai 1/2 Zip Sweater, 100% Merino - Mens
